title: Uncle Si Shakes It on the 'Catwalk'
description:
Si models his snazzy new jacket, and he's got moves! Martin, Godwin, and John-David are grossed out by what Si does with Vicks VapoRub. Si decides he's a "painologist." Martin and Si tell us how they REALLY feel about meatless meat. And Si talks about meeting his wife, his time living in Germany, how to stay childlike and joyful, and what he thinks of Bible movies.
-
